data.name: ViewCredentialTitle
data.comment: Page header title for viewing a credential

data.name: EditButtonMobile
data.comment: Text for edit button on mobile

data.name: EditButtonDesktop
data.comment: Text for edit button on desktop

data.name: DeleteButtonMobile
data.comment: Text for delete button on mobile

data.name: DeleteButtonDesktop
data.comment: Text for delete button on desktop

data.name: GeneratedCredentialsDescription
data.value: Ci-dessous vous pouvez voir et copier les identifiants générés pour ce compte. Tous les emails envoyés à l'adresse affichée apparaîtront automatiquement sur cette page.
data.comment: Description for generated credentials with email support

data.name: StoredCredentialsDescription
data.value: Ci-dessous vous pouvez voir et copier les identifiants de connexion enregistrés pour ce compte.
data.comment: Description for stored credentials without email support

data.name: ViewCredentialBreadcrumb
data.comment: Breadcrumb text for view credential page

data.name: CredentialNotFoundError
data.value: Ce mot de passe n'existe plus. Veuillez réessayer.
data.comment: Error message when credential is not found

data.name: PasskeySiteLabel
data.comment: Label for passkey site/relying party ID

data.name: PasskeyHelpText
data.value: Passkeys are created through the browser extension or mobile apps when prompted by a website. They cannot be manually edited or created through the web app. To remove this passkey, you can delete it from this credential. To replace or create a new passkey, visit the website and follow its prompts.
data.comment: Help text explaining how passkeys work
